Text:
Awesome and thanks

I'm glad this brilliant woman is here for us

And you too 480v

480v was gone for weeks, so I subscribed 
to Randi Rhodes' show to catch up on what I missed from the torrents... and also The Ed Schultz Show too.

@ Exec

Have you considered uploading the source files you now have access to? It would be a tremendous help for not only me, but for anyone who otherwise cannot get these shows unless someone shares on p2p. 

For example, the best I can upload for Randi's June 4th show is hours 2 and 3 only. I still have to scan through the audio and remove all commercials before I upload. Your files are already commercial free, aren't they? Please...I can really use the help.

Yes,  480v -- My Randi Rhodes podcast files are commercial-free. Plus they don't have the annoying bumper music normally heard in between segments too.  Only my priority now is uploading classic 1980s episodes of Saturday Night Live.

Also I plan to soon cancel my Randi Rhodes subscription to save $6 a month, since I'm now paying that for The Ed Schultz Show.   I'll probably upload Ed's radio show instead.....once I run out of SNL episodes later this month.

@ Exec
Can you at least upload yesterday's (June 4) Randi show?  I don't have the complete show.
I uploaded the June 4 show last night. Hope you got it.
